sentences.en: Appendix in full vermiform appendix: Vestigial hollow tube attached to the cecum of the large intestine.
sentences.cn: 阑尾(全名名蚓状阑尾): 解剖学上附于大肠的盲肠的一条退化性中空管.

sentences.en: At most , their forelegs grow vestigial spurs where wing membrane might have been.
sentences.cn: 最终, 它们本应长为翅膀的前肢会退化为薄膜.

sentences.en: Here history is vestigial and numerous.
I believe the reflex is a vestigial response from the time when inevitable meant " God. "
sentences.cn: 我认为,这是历史残留的正常的反应,因为那时“必然”指的就是 “ 上帝 ”.

sentences.en: One laboratory stock of Drosophila melanogaster has very reduced or vestigial wings.
sentences.cn: 果蝇的一种实验品系,翅膀缩小,称为残翅.

sentences.en: Still save limekiln of the bay below good sea wanting number now vestigial.
sentences.cn: 现仍保存良好的要数海下湾石灰窑遗迹.

sentences.en: The legs of snakes are vestigial or absent altogether.
sentences.cn: 蛇的腿已经退化或完全消失。

sentences.en: The wings of the chicken have become vestigial; it can no longer fly.
sentences.cn: 鸡的翅膀逐渐退化, 不会在空中飞行了.

sentences.en: Vestigial remains of these plays are now seen in the Christmas pantomime.
sentences.cn: 在圣诞节演出的哑剧中还能看到这些戏剧残留下来的痕迹。

words.tran_cn: [生物]退化的；残余的；发育不全的

trans.tran_en: a vestigial part of the body has never developed completely or has almost disappeared
